cleanPageDescription: Clean browser cache and website data to improve browsing experience
performancePageDescription: Analyze the loading performance and resource usage of the current page
settingsPageDescription: Customize plugin behavior and cleaning rules
selected_data_cleared: Selected data types have been cleared
sensitive_data_warning: You've selected types that contain sensitive data. You may need to log in again after cleaning.
cacheDescription: Temporary stored page resources and files
cookiesDescription: User identification and preference data stored by websites
sessionStorageDescription: Temporary session data, cleared after closing the tab
special_page_message: This is a browser built-in page or extension page. Real performance data cannot be retrieved. The displayed data is simulated.
troubleshooting_tips: Troubleshooting tips: Try refreshing the page before testing, or wait until the page is fully loaded before trying again.
